inclusion.criterion: LUTS secondary to BOO due to BPH who failed medical treatment
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: history of acute urinary retention in the past 2 days, Abdominopelvic CT scan revealed a large prostate and a bladder filled with urine

inclusion.criterion: International prostate symptom scores (IPSS) >15 and bother score (QOL) ≥ 3
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Post-void residual: 71 mL, Prostate volume (TRUS): 63 mL, Prostate-specific antigen (PSA) level: 3.5 ng/mL

inclusion.criterion: Peak urinary flow rate (Qmax) <15 ml/sec with at least 125 ml voided volume
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with acute urine retention secondary to BPH who failed trial of voiding on medical treatment
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: history of acute urinary retention in the past 2 days

exclusion.criterion: Patient with neurological disorder which might affect bladder function as cerebrovascular stroke, Parkinson disease
exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
exclusion.evidence: U/A: Color: yellow, Appearance: cloudy, PH: 5.3, Specific gravity: 1.010, Glc: 100, Nitrite: negative, Ketone: none, Leukocyte esterase: negative, RBC: negative, WBC: 2 WBCs/hpf

exclusion.criterion: Presence of active bladder cancer (within the last 2 years)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known prostate cancer patients will be excluded preoperatively on the basis of digital rectal examination, prostate specific antigen level, and TRUS imaging followed by prostate biopsies if necessary.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has a disorder of the coagulation cascade (e.g., liver cell failure) or disorders that affect platelet count or function (e.g., von Willebrand disease) that would put the subject at risk for intraoperative or postoperative bleeding.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient is unable to discontinue anticoagulant and antiplatelet therapy preoperatively (3-5 d) except for low-dose aspirin (e.g., 100 mg).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has had an acute myocardial infarction or open-heart surgery <180 days prior to the date of informed consent.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a candidate for urethral catheterization and TURP. Further evaluation revealed normal recent blood chemistry.
